lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I´m a right wing libertarian/objectivist, a believer in the benefits of a free market economy, entrepreneurship and honesty. It's nice to help people help themselves and others, without any government involvement or coercion. Just basic benevolence I guess.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: It's an investment in humanity.  What could be better than that?

lenders.name: Jason and Janet
lenders.loan_because: We consider it an investment in the future of humanity.  Helping people help themselves leaves both parties feeling better about themselves.

lenders.name: Allan

lenders.name: Kay and Dennis
lenders.loan_because: We have been very fortunate in our lives and believe in giving back, especially to those less fortunate who are trying to make a better life for their families.

lenders.name: Sunny
lenders.loan_because:

I love Kiva because I feel personally connected to the women to whom I loan.  The women I loan to inspire ME!!

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: To demonstrate the love of Christ in a real and practical way.
lenders.occupational_info: I help students in foreign countries come to the US for education.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I truly hope I can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired air traffic controller.

lenders.name: Michele and Kaya
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to work from home while raising my daughter. My husband and I value the comfortable life we have built together, and appreciate the opportunity to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I handle the financial operation of a small livestock ranch, as well as scheduling shipments (over water) of livestock to and from Hawaii.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can. A bit here, a bit there and we can change the world

lenders.name: Nancy

-- Elvis Presley

To date:  Loans to 68 different countries!

lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I am very fortunate and would like to share some of my good fortune with people in other countries.

lenders.name: Robert

lenders.name: Bob & Jean

Dear children, let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth". (1 John 3: 17-18)
lenders.occupational_info: Before we retired, Jean taught medical-surgical nursing and Bob taught secondary school Honors and Advanced Placement Physics.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: Microloans are much more than just throwing money at a problem, they affect people directly. It's a very profound experience to actually see your loan help deserving and enterprising people in other countries.

lenders.name: Stephen

lenders.name: Joanne

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and wish to share God's gifts with others.  There are many people in this world who work much harder than I, and I must admire them and do my best to help and support them in such a simple way.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.whereabouts: Newcastle upon Tyne Tyne and Wear

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me in so many ways and I am thankful that I can help others in need.  May He bless these industrious people.

lenders.name: Frances
lenders.loan_because: In today's world, we are all global neighbors who must understand and help each other.

lenders.name: Traci & Jeff
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed to be so fortunate & it feels good to help others in need.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: it allows my money to be borrowed, repaid and borrowed again.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired, but I volunteer many hours each week

lenders.name: D&M
lenders.loan_because: You feed a man a fish, you have fed him for a day. you teach a man how to fish, you have fed him for life.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I have been doing volunteer work in third world countries for the past 20 years. I have seen what a difference a small loan can make to a family and community.

lenders.name: Jasmine

lenders.name: Mary Fairy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the goodness of humanity.  I am blessed and wish to share the wealth.  I applaud your efforts!
lenders.occupational_info: I have a degree in wildlife biology and have 10 acres in the country  that I am trying to improve so that someday we can support a few goats, chickens, and rabbits.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's the right thing to do.  :)
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business owner and it is hard but rewarding work.  I retail and wholesale craft supplies to small business owners via the Internet.

lenders.name: Noel and Judith
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to help others to use their gifts and passion for their family, their community and the world. Through our lives, others have helped us - now it is our turn.
lenders.occupational_info: Noel's family motto: "Do all your work as to God." (It sounds better in Gaelic!)

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to live in a society where food is abundant and running water and shelter is taken for granted.  This is my small contribution...
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom of three children.  My son is 3 years old and I have twin girls who are 17 months old; to say the least I am very busy!

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are working to make a better life for themselves and their families.  God has blessed me with a very fortunate life, and this is my way of giving back to the world. :)

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and I believe people should help others when they can.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell relaxation, healing music composed by my husband (who has already passed on).  His music is beautiful

lenders.name: joshm
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I've been where many people are now and I can relate to what they're going through.  This is my way of giving back to all those people who helped me out before things turned around for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for businesses as a consultant in advertising and public relations.

lenders.name: Jenna
lenders.loan_because: my summer school community psychology professor introduced me to this and I think this is a very rewarding way to help people around the world and make a significant difference in someone else's life!
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I am a full-time college student at the University of Illinois at Chicago majoring in Psychology. I will be graduating in Spring of 2008

lenders.name: Brian & Kim
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed!
lenders.occupational_info: Awesome!  Love what we do!  Come join us!

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance and retirement is overrated

lenders.name: jim & linda
lenders.loan_because: GOD IS GREAT! HE provides me more than we need. My wife Linda and I are so blessed. " His mercy endures forever"
lenders.occupational_info: Linda and I are nurses at City of Hope. We work with cancer patients. Our Catholic faith leads us to serve our Lord in works of charity to all. No conditions, no borders. Beautiful!

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: What a great way to make a difference in someone's life.  It seems so personal even though the people are so far away.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Social Studies teacher.  I teach high school, grades 9 - 12. I teach US History, American Government, Psychology and World Geography.

lenders.name: Rich
lenders.loan_because: My education is in economics and my faith is in the Holy Trinity. These types of loans provide market-based opportunities to people who have had far less opportunities than I've had. Jesus taught us that when we help the least among us we honor Him. Making microloans allows me to use the same dollars over and over to help others. Sustainable Philanthropy! How can it get better than that!
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell tiny ownership stakes in very large companies. I hope to buy low and sell high and make a profit. That's me chasing my son in the 50M dash. He's autistic and doesn't fully understand races but he loves being chased. As you can see, we're both having a great time.

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired elementary (5th grade) teacher.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: My physical disability makes it too hard to travel far and help in person. It seems that the dollar buys a lot more in developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I use math and science on computers to find and fix problems in large complex sets of numbers.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people with good ideas provide service to their communites and be able to provide a good life for their kids.
lenders.occupational_info: I help direct the public buses so that people can get to work and to the store and kids can get to school.

lenders.name: Teramis
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone out.
lenders.occupational_info: I write novels.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I want to be the change I wish to see in the world.

lenders.name: Frank & Nicole
lenders.loan_because: God told us "I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me." (Matthew 25:40)

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because:
I believe....

Our Lord spoke of investing talents...and as our seeds grow...we use the profits to reseed communities and spread God's love.
lenders.occupational_info: You are loved/ You are valued. We believe in you and trust in you to keep your promises and your dreams.

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: I am very  touched by the needs of women around the world. I want to stay connected and be part of the movement to end poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with men, women and children who have serious mental health problems.

lenders.name: Jim Smith
lenders.loan_because: This idea is the coolest application of technology I've seen in a long time!  Being a small part of it makes me feel like a mini-Bono!
lenders.occupational_info: I direct the efforts of lots of software development nerds like me.  They're good guys and gals and I'm the luckiest boss in the world!

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: It's exciting to watch others achieve their goals and know that we have been a small part of that. Good luck to everyone!
lenders.occupational_info: Property Angels is an independent, family owned and run real estate business on the North Fork of Long Island, New York. We know what it takes to build a small business!

lenders.name: Robert & Robin
lenders.loan_because: What seems like such a small amount to us can be very meaningful to someone living in a different part of the world. It's wonderful being able to pool our individual resources to make a difference in peoples' lives.

lenders.name: Meri
lenders.loan_because: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has."  -Margaret Meade-

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I deeply care about helping spread propserity throughout the world and I also feel very strongly towards rewarding the entrepreneurial spirit of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for our news department at our local television station. I research and write stories for various news reports.

lenders.name: Raphael
lenders.loan_because: I believe good fortune in life should be shared with others. Then maybe one day poverty can be eliminated...
lenders.occupational_info: I make the skys safe to fly for a major american airline company by inspecting airplanes for safety.

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because: I would like to see a fairer, more equitable society, where everyone has an equal opportunity to survive and thrive.

lenders.name: Raymond
lenders.loan_because: a small investment from me enables those who want to better themself and their family to a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I retired at age 56 as a Controller in private business to enjoy life and have never regretted the decision.  As a confessed workaholic never took time for myself now life is great.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I spent a few years in Brasil as a teenager and the people there changed my life.  I want to give something back and be a part of this vibrant emerging nation where just a little help can mean such a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help introduce new nursing students to the world of bacteria, viruses and other disease causing agents as well as training them how to protect themselves and their patients from disease.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: I love those who work hard to pursuit their dreams. I am truely inspired by someone who have the courage to build their dreams and make it happen.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a yoga teacher and a teacher teaches about energy. Basically helping people to find their inner-self!

lenders.name: Neil Geisler
lenders.occupational_info: I work on development of devices for disease diagnostics for global health care applications.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit counts. No one person can make everything better everywhere, but thousands working together can make some things better in some places. It feels good to be able to be one of those people helping to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I specialize in raising chili peppers and garlic, selling them primarily at local Farmers Markets. I also make and sell jelly made from the peppers and a wonderful garlic jelly. Along with that I also raise some herbs and other plants for sale. I do have another job, but it is the farming I really enjoy. As far as writing, I do bits and pieces of writing here and there and am working on a couple of books.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: it's a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Kanyi
lenders.loan_because: I give because serving other people is serving God.

lenders.name: Alison & Andrew

lenders.occupational_info: Alison is a travel and nature photographer and Andrew helps large companies use the software designed by his company.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky to have a well paid career which gives me the freedom to make choices about where I visit, the sort of lifestyle I want to lead and the ability not to have too many financial worries
lenders.occupational_info: I help organisations implement changes in their business to improve the way things are done, to reduce costs and enhance profits

lenders.name: CC

lenders.occupational_info: Management of complex commercial arrangements between companies for products and services

lenders.name: Niki
lenders.occupational_info: graphic designer

lenders.name: Margareta
lenders.loan_because: It's a good idea to get my money working!

lenders.occupational_info: Retired Senior Chief Petty Officer, US Navy.

lenders.name: Søren Kiilerich

lenders.occupational_info:
I design products or solutions to problems. Years ago I made an artificial leg for landmine vitims in Cambodia and a new way to detect landmines (by using trained sniffing rats - they won't get harmed!). To read more, please visit: http://www.xs4all.nl/~inne/vs/legprot.htm or http://www.xs4all.nl/~inne/vs/report.htm or http://www.apopo.org
Today I have a small business in making websites where people meet and share knowledge (web 2.0)

lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school history

lenders.loan_because:
I want to still in my country Syria, but I've to do the mandatory milatery service (2 years) unless I pay $3000. So I've to leave my family to go to K.S.A or U.A.E to work for 5 years then I could pay $5000 to free myself.
I can pay now cause I lived in K.S.A for 12 years. So the laws here allow me to pay $3000.
I want to live in my country with my family , having my own work with a good position in a good company
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a websites programmer, Oracle OCA (database administrator).
working in IT technology field.

lenders.name: Lorenzo

lenders.occupational_info: Bob teaches 5th grade children in elementary school , preparing them for the life that is ahead of them . I work with old people  who  live in nursing homes, helping them to get stronger and to be as independent as possible as they near the end of their lives.

lenders.name: Inge
lenders.loan_because: Makes me feel good.

lenders.name: Barbara

lenders.occupational_info: I sell household goods to people.

lenders.name: Richard

lenders.name: Jennifer

lenders.name: Chris

lenders.name: John and Tetyana

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: People who are willing to work to make their lives better deserve a way to do that.    Kiva offers a simple way that I can help.

lenders.name: Kiote
lenders.loan_because: Love

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of the other people on this planet, if only in a small way. The way of life we enjoy in the United States usually comes at the expense of others - usually by "acquiring" their country's resources and/or "encouraging" them to accept trade deals that only benefit the US and/or propping up some oppressive puppet government.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a former member of the US Military and am now self employed.

lenders.name: Yahn-Rurng
lenders.loan_because: My buddy Richard introduced me to Kiva - he's a sensitive liberal who drinks fair trade starbucks, plans vacations to eco resorts, and strives to make the world a better place for all.

lenders.name: Abdiwali
lenders.loan_because: Micro financing is one way I can make a difference, and can fulfill my share of responsibility towards helping the human family.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: Everyone with a realistic idea and a good plan should have access to capital.
lenders.occupational_info: Using commercial real estate to meet people's everyday needs.

lenders.occupational_info: I help young children learn to communicate with their family and others

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Helping someone else means more (and the satisfaction lasts longer) than does spending money on myself, and the small sum of money involved goes so much further in the developing world than it does here.

lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in the world to help those that want to help themselves. I feel like my life is blessed, so I'd like to empower others to fulfill any dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Work hard...play hard

lenders.loan_because: Germantown, MD

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: I Know how Hard it can be to start a Business and for these people its a way to Support there Families and a way to Have a better Life. Changing the world One Small Deed at a time!
lenders.occupational_info: I Own and Operate a Oriental Grocery Store In GA and My Business has been good to me and i hope i can Help someone Fulfill their Dream of Business Ownership

lenders.name: Skip & Donna
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed in our lives & have seen first hand the loving caring people in poor countries such as Mexico who just need a hand up.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: To be a blessing for someone in need for the glory of God.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired -Sales Rep. for over 33 years in the home furnishings field.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I was blessed with the opportunity to do so. I was blessed with the ability to live a life free from hunger and oppressive poverty. If with this small amount I help someone liberate themselves from the shackles of poverty, the loan will pay back much more than just money.
